name: Nen Jumper
description:
Collect Massive Incredible Heroes
Collect massive heroes from Tavern, each with their own unique skills. Try various skill combos and assemble the ultimate team to against the powers of evils!

Fight against opponents in Heaven's arena
Set your lineup and send team in Heaven's arena to earn your own victories. Try to beat stronger enemy, climb higher level and achieve ultimate glory!

Evolve your heroes
There are three types of heroes, supportive, offensive and defensive. Each of their skills can support your team to explore this mysterious continent. Consume runes to upgrade your heroes’ basic status, increasing their level by EXP potion, and make your team more stronger!
